ComicInfo.Summary: Now You See It . . .: After attending a Vegas film convention with Marlo, Bruce returns to his suite before night falls and he turns into the Hulk. As the Hulk snoozes, he is carried away into an ideal illusion created by Glorian (ideal for the Hulk, that is, which includes running the Leader down with a limo). Breaking out of the spell, Hulk attacks Glorian and beats him to death with Marlo, in horror, looking on.
